title: Raging planet : avalanche : blizzard
brief_description: ‘Avalanche’ examines the awesome and frightening power of avalanches, their unpredictable nature and their deceptive grace. ‘Blizzard’ examines the beauty of snowfall and it’s place as a source of recreation and pleasure, but when that friendly snowfall becomes a blizzard - with excessively high winds and low temperatures - lives are often at stake.
